data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about the increase in worldwide travel.
data.answer: As traveling by airplanes becoming common, worldwide travel has increased significantly. Without doubts, people can broaden their horizons by traveling abroad since they will have the opportunity to experience exotic cultures themselves. For some people who are working in creative jobs, traveling can bring diverse ideas to them. There is a quote, which goes 'The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page. Travelling can also help us to establish connections and build networks abroad, which is beneficial to our further developments. However, there are also negative effects brought on by increasing travel. Especially in developing countries, people there have less capacity to solve the pollution and garbage left in attractions. One of the main reasons for the increase is that the prices of air tickets become acceptable to common people. Moreover, influenced by online media, people are more willing to step out of their homes to see what it looks like in other parts of the world. (164字)

options.content: How is it beneficial for people?
